content: alva an icelandic sweater by maria vangen alva is an icelandic inspired sweater knitted with the icelandic yarn alafoss lopi it only comes in size 3 years for now but i might add other sizes later size and measurements size 3 years bust 66 cm / 26 0 sleeve length from underarm 26 cm / 10 2 length from underarm 24 cm / 9 4 materials istex alafoss lopi 100% bulky 12 ply icelandic wool color 1 about 200 g main color 9959 indigo color 2 under 50 g contrasting color 0008 light denim heather color 3 about 100 g contrasting color 0051 white size 5 0 mm needles size 6 0 mm needles i ve only used size 80 mm circular needles for both yoke and arms but if you are not familiar with magic loop you need double pointed needles in addition to circular gauge 14 stitches in 10 cm/4 inch with needle size 6 0 mm / 10 us yoke pattern sleeve pattern knitting instructions the sweater is knit bottom-up start by knitting the body and both sleeves up to the yoke the underarm stitches of the body and the sleeves are transferred to pieces of scrap yarn or stitch holders and the remaining stitches of the body and the sleeves are combined on a circular knitting needle to form the yoke which is shaped by simple decreases until the neckline stitches are cast off the underarm stitches on the body and the sleeves are grafted together by the kitchener stitch body with a 5 0 mm / 8 us circular needle cast on 89 sts in color 1 join in a circle and work seed stitch for 5 row round 1 3 and 5 *k1 p1* round 2 4 *p1 k1* and so on change to a 6 0 mm / 10 us circular needle and knit the body and at the same time increase by 3 sts evenly spaced 92 sts continue until the body measures 24 cm / 9 4 from the cast on row do not knit the last 3 sts of the last round set aside and knit the sleeves sleeves with a 5 0 mm / 8 us cast on 24 sts in color 3 using double pointed knitting needles or a long circular needle if using magic loop join in a circle and work seed stitch for 5 row change to 6 0 mm / 10 us needles knit the sleeves pattern in st st and increase 4 sts evenly spaced in the first pattern row 28 sts in the 14th pattern row increase 1 sts after the first stitch in the row and 1 stitch before the last stitch in the same row repeat increases 2 more times in every 11th row increases in total > 34 sts continue without further shaping until the sleeve measure 26 cm / 10 2 from
